Description 

In Dark Shadows: Army of Evil represented by only a single mode, divided into 19 levels, each of which players will be able to find a new kind of weapon. Players will cut, cut and chop their opponents and throw stones at them and shoot archery. The developers promise a memorable gloomy atmosphere, spiced up with special "cinematic" three-dimensional effects like blood spatter.
